snippet: The debate over gay marriage has showcased the weird spectacle of religion intruding into politics in a country where religion has not been a political factor for a generation or more.
abstract: The debate over gay marriage has showcased the weird spectacle of religion intruding into politics in a country where religion has not been a political factor for a generation or more.
